name: TerraTerror
description:
There are enemies coming after you to destroy you, unfortunately, you don't have any weapons to fight back against them. However, you have the ability to control objects (other than the enemies) near you. Destroy the enemies by crashing objects into them and survive for as long as you can.

WASD to move

Shift to sprint

Click and drag objects to control and move them

note: Collision might bug out sometimes, causing the objects to phase through the enemies instead, collision works better in the downloaded version.

Sounds made in sfxr (https://sfxr.me/)

Update: Collisions should work better now
